segments.text: I'm too tired now . I've already worked for 12 hours overtime !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: God ! Don't you think they should get you an assistant ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , they were supposed to , but so far nobody's turned up , and I have to do the work alone . This is the first break I've had all day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They're really running you into the ground . Why don't you ask for some time off ? You could take a long weekend and have a good rest .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm afraid I can't before I finish this project .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You'd better pay more attention to your health .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will , thanks for your concern .
segments.speaker: S1
